title: Am I Doing The Right Thing?
description:
Evan is thinking of making a career change that will reduce his pay by half but will give him more time with his family. - Dr. Laura: "The bumps in the road can make the journey more fun."

What priorities do you see as important when it comes to family? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
